derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (originally US, denoting prepared foods for sale): from German Delikatessen or Dutch delicatessen, from French délicatesse 'delicateness', from délicat (see delicate)

entry.tran: (出售优质进口干酪、冷盘肉等的)熟食店
entry.def: A delicatessen is a shop that sells high quality foods such as cheeses and cold meats that have been imported from other countries.

means.word_mean: 2. a shop selling delicatessen (as salads or cooked meats)
